title: Looking to trade a sgc10 Turkey Red Raymond for a m116 Evers or other Turkey reds
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking to trade a sgc10 Turkey Red Raymond for a m116 Evers or other Turkey reds
posts.post_content:
Have a very presentable ad back Bugs Raymond SGC10 T3 for trade. Preferably wanting a black backed m116 evers but would consider other t3's(preferably Chicago teams) as well or t202's or a unique Hal Chase card. Email me and let me know what you have,
sean :)
